name: Resonance Formation: Crystal Pincers
desc: Metamorphosis additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by 40%. Only when a character is under the Metamorphosis effect can they cause Spores to burst. Every time a character causes 1 Spore to burst, additionally deals Basic ATK DMG equal to 80% of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to 3 time(s) on the same target.
